groups.name: app.logging
groups.description: Configuration properties for structured JSON logging.

properties.name: app.logging.enabled
properties.description: Whether the logging starter is enabled.

properties.name: app.logging.json.enabled
properties.description: Whether JSON output is enabled.

properties.name: app.logging.json.pretty-print
properties.description: Whether to pretty-print JSON output (not recommended for production).

properties.name: app.logging.json.include-context
properties.description: Whether to include logging context (logger name, thread, etc.).

properties.name: app.logging.json.include-mdc
properties.description: Whether to include MDC values.

properties.name: app.logging.json.include-caller-data
properties.description: Whether to include caller data (class, method, line number). Has performance implications.

properties.name: app.logging.json.include-stack-trace
properties.description: Whether to include exception stack traces.

properties.name: app.logging.json.timestamp-format
properties.description: Custom timestamp format (ISO-8601 by default).

properties.name: app.logging.json.timezone
properties.description: Timezone for timestamps.

properties.name: app.logging.static-tags
properties.description: Static tags to include in every log line. Defined at startup and remain constant.

properties.name: app.logging.dynamic-tags.prefix
properties.description: Prefix to add to all dynamic tag field names.

properties.name: app.logging.dynamic-tags.nested
properties.description: Whether to nest dynamic tags under a single field.

properties.name: app.logging.dynamic-tags.nested-field-name
properties.description: Field name to use when nesting dynamic tags.

properties.name: app.logging.tracing.enabled
properties.description: Whether tracing integration is enabled.

properties.name: app.logging.tracing.trace-id-field
properties.description: Field name for trace ID in JSON output.

properties.name: app.logging.tracing.span-id-field
properties.description: Field name for span ID in JSON output.

properties.name: app.logging.logbook.enabled
properties.description: Whether Logbook HTTP traffic logging is enabled.

properties.name: app.logging.logbook.logger-name
properties.description: Logger name for HTTP traffic logs.

properties.name: app.logging.logbook.level
properties.description: Log level for HTTP traffic.

properties.name: app.logging.logbook.masked-headers
properties.description: Headers to mask in logs (sensitive data).

properties.name: app.logging.logbook.masked-body-paths
properties.description: JSON paths to mask in request/response bodies.

properties.name: app.logging.logbook.max-body-size
properties.description: Maximum body size to log (in bytes).

properties.name: app.logging.logbook.log-request-body
properties.description: Whether to log request bodies.

properties.name: app.logging.logbook.log-response-body
properties.description: Whether to log response bodies.

properties.name: app.logging.logbook.exclude-paths
properties.description: Paths to exclude from logging (supports ant-style patterns).

properties.name: app.logging.console.enabled
properties.description: Whether console logging is enabled.

properties.name: app.logging.console.level
properties.description: Log level threshold for console output.

properties.name: app.logging.file.enabled
properties.description: Whether file logging is enabled.

properties.name: app.logging.file.path
properties.description: Log file path.

properties.name: app.logging.file.level
properties.description: Log level threshold for file output.

properties.name: app.logging.file.max-size
properties.description: Maximum file size before rolling.

properties.name: app.logging.file.max-history
properties.description: Maximum number of archive files to keep.

properties.name: app.logging.file.total-size-cap
properties.description: Total size cap for all archive files.
